summary: Computer Science Major currently enrolled at Portland State University whose objective is to gain experience with different aspects of computer science and to build a solid foundation that allows me to thrive in the world of technology development. Aspiring Computational Linguist who is interested in Full-Stack Web Development, Software Development, and Natural Language Processing. I am currently seeking an entry-level position to help guide my path into industry. A childhood fascination for learning foreign languages has fueled a growing interest in computer programming languages and computer science. Graduation date from Portland State University is set for December 2024.
